title: Airbnb Booking Demand & Pricing Analytics
summary: Predicted nightly prices & booking likelihood (89% accuracy). Segmented demand via clustering; ARIMA/Prophet seasonal forecasts.

title: Uber NYC Pickups EDA & Clustering
summary: EDA over 10M+ rows, hypothesis tests & regression; matplotlib visuals; insights on spatiotemporal demand.

title: Healthcare Readmission Prediction Model
summary: Built RF & XGBoost models on 500K+ patient records to predict readmission risk, enabling targeted interventions.

title: Pharmaceutical Trial Data Analysis
summary: Analyzed clinical trial data using causal inference and subgroup analysis to guide $4.2M go/no-go decisions.
